My Reading list

This is a place for me to document my reading. DISCLAIMER: All links are affiliate links through Amazon. Many of these books can be found more cheaply elsewhere, though probably most conveniently through the links.

In Progress

  • Automotive Technology: A Systems Approach

  • The Explosive Child

  • Star Wars: Heir to the Empire. This is the first book in the original Thrawn Trilogy.

  • Wings for the Rising Sun: A Transnational History of Japanese Aviation

Completed

  • Christopher Hitchen’s God is Not Great

  • Twilight of the Gods: An account of WWII in the Pacific.

  • Alastair Reynold’s Revelation Space
  • Ignition: An Informal History of Liquid Rocket Propellents

Future
